title: Bug 102623: Image not refreshing after re-import
OB: When importing an image again in the layout, the image does not refresh.
EB: The image should refresh and show the newly imported image.
SR:
1. Import a new image, named 'image1.jpg', into the layout view.
2. Delete the 'image1.jpg' file from the outline image.
3. Rename 'image2.jpg' to 'image1.jpg'.
4. Import the renamed 'image1.jpg' file into the layout view.
